MR No. 255 - Church Members to Have the Mind of Christ

     "Verily I say unto you, whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven:  and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven" (Matthew 18:18). When every specification which Christ has given has been carried out in the true, Christian spirit, then, and then only, Heaven ratifies the decision of the church, because its members have the mind of Christ, and do as He would do were He upon the earth.--Letter 1c, 1890, p. 3. (To Brethren Atwood and Pratt, May 28, 1890.) 

Released September 27, 1970.
